channel.title: CVE Feed for Livemesh -- Livemesh Addons for Elementor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Livemesh -- Livemesh Addons for Elementor

item.title: CVE-2024-37547|2024-07-19T10:52:57.355Z -- livemesh -- livemesh%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Livemesh Livemesh Addons for Elementor.This issue affects Livemesh Addons for Elementor: from n/a through 8.4.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-37547|2024-07-06T14:39:52.415Z -- livemesh -- livemesh%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Livemesh Livemesh Addons for Elementor.This issue affects Livemesh Addons for Elementor: from n/a through 8.3.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-25598|2024-03-15T13:07:37.793Z -- livemesh -- livemesh%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Livemesh Livemesh Addons for Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Livemesh Addons for Elementor: from n/a through 8.3.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Livemesh Livemesh Addons for Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Livemesh Addons for Elementor: from n/a through 8.3.
